title: Overview: This folder will cover some service procedures
text: The service procedures are best carried out as a COWSYS user The most common procedures can be found in the SYSTEM Service Service procedures
description:
The service procedures are best carried out as a COWSYS user


The most common procedures can be found in the

SYSTEM

Service

Service procedures

title: Article Consistency Check
text: Due to a number of bookings or other (not really explainable) things, so-called inconsistencies in items can occur. This can manifest itself in various phenomena, most often (as in the example) that in the overview list of items an inventory is displayed that appears differently when you go to the item detail view. In the example, you can see 5 items in the inventory and 15 in the detail. You mark the article in the Articles area and then go to System -> Service Procedure There you select "_AtArtKOnsMachen" and click on "Execute" The article(s) are marked in the window that opens You click on OK After successful execution, this is displayed in the window Now the display should show the same thing everywhere again
description:
Due to a number of bookings or other (not really explainable) things, so-called inconsistencies in items can occur.


This can manifest itself in various phenomena, most often (as in the example) that in the overview list of items an inventory is displayed that appears differently when you go to the item detail view.


In the example, you can see 5 items in the inventory and 15 in the detail.



You mark the article in the Articles area and then go to System -> Service Procedure

There you select "_AtArtKOnsMachen" and click on "Execute"


The article(s) are marked in the window that opens

You click on OK

After successful execution, this is displayed in the window


Now the display should show the same thing everywhere again

title: Transfer adresses
text: Cowsys->System->Service->Service Prozeduren->Adressen übertragen->Ausführen->links unten sieht man dann dass Cowis arbeitet->Datenaustausch in Warenwirtschaft ausführen Could take some hours if the customer has a lot of adresses
description:
Cowsys->System->Service->Service Prozeduren->Adressen übertragen->Ausführen->links unten sieht man dann dass Cowis arbeitet->Datenaustausch in Warenwirtschaft ausführen

Could take some hours if the customer has a lot of adresses
